name: FOOZLE - GDKO 2023
description:
GDKO 2023 GAME JAM SUBMISSION

US SERVER. EU SERVER HERE: https://foozlecc.itch.io/foozle-gdko-2023-eu

CONTROLS:

Tap "F" to toggle between first and 3rd person.

WASD for moving + QE for strafe.

In 3rd person, you can hold left click to look around or hold right click to move the character with the camera. (similar to default WoW controls).  In the future I hope to make this customizable to turn off some of the default items like auto swinging back behind the character in 3rd person.  I have to say... this took a TON of effort to make this 3d camera controller in C3 since there is no default option.  I suggest first person in tight spaces :)

NOTE: You need to register due to the nature of the game.  You don't need to provide an email though, just check the box on the register screen.

---

Come check out the mini mmo space I have created for GDKO.  I am a bit crazy and wanted to push Construct 3's 3D capabilities to its limits using both the native and plugin tools available. 

LEVEL DESIGN:

Level is meant to be a town in the midst of lava... currently the lava is harmless but only had so much time.  I hope the multiplayer dedicated server helps count toward the unique environment.  In the future I will add chat which is something I had to cut out for now due to time constraints.

MOST of the available time I had was just enabling a dedicated game server for multiplayer and the 3D camera control to explore... so the level is currently a bit of a hack, some of the collision boxes need to be totally rework and a more immersive environment designed.

3D Object Plugin: https://kindeyegames.itch.io/c3-3dobject-alpha

This demo uses Construct 3, Colyseus.io for the dedicated game server, and Playfab for user authentication and account management.

This is a bare bones move around and jump around.

Head on up to the top of the towers on the walls for a nice view :)

Players are synced but projectiles are currently not.

Feel free to ping me on Discord on any items! Foozle#8597
